Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9.2 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 13.7 with a standard deviation 1.5. The z-score of the person with 9.2 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -3.72
* -3
* -2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.72: Incorrect
* 3: Correct
-2: Incorrect
